Changes to leaflet-geotiff:

1) Added support for setting data directly (not just url)
2) Added support for layer click and mouse mouse (cursor change over valid cells)
3) Added support for Leaflet custom panes
4) Added error checks for value access from raster array

Changes to leaflet-geotiff-plotty:

1) Added support for user defining of noData value
2) Added support for opacity setting
